channel.title: Grammar Nazi!
channel.description: Okay, I was perfectly happy when he was going around correcting people and being slightly annoying but come on people! Who the fuck gave him a batman award? Bunch of arseholes.

item.title: Grammar Nazi!
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:41, topic:196000”]I banned him for trollish behaviour, he appears to be using TOR so that really sums it up.

About an hour later someone on the IRC suggested he should get a batman, I thought it was a pretty good idea and gave it to him.[/quote]
Oh… I accidentally logged in with tor active on MITB.org and I was banned there instantly
Mopar fixed it for me, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Grammar Nazi!
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:39, topic:196000”][quote author=cooper link=topic=260556.msg2162697#msg2162697 date=1207431367]

He is some crazy australlian whose only avatar is that fat bitch you have in your space.

Well I meet the ‘crazy Australian’ requirement, but I’ve had other avatars before. It’s just an appropriate avatar because I’m Australian and therefore a criminal.

Ben_Goten78 is [I believe] the founder/definitely a maintainer of zybez.net and [quoting from memory] he “no longer plays, only updates the site.”
[/quote]

How can you no longer play but update a site completely based on Runescape.[/quote]
It really doesn’t seem to hard to me, but you should ask him maybe.

Read full topic

item.title: Grammar Nazi!
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

His posts can be found here: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=254854;sa=showPosts

If it wasn’t already obvious, I’ll elaborate: his posts are clearly aiming to rile up users, more or less through provocation. What better way to make someone angry than to pick at their posts. He was trying to provoke users, and I’m surprised that you guys didn’t notice that.

There was also another account linked to his IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Grammar Nazi!
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:13, topic:196000”][quote author=goatee link=topic=260556.msg2160733#msg2160733 date=1207370535]
He’s created less spam than alot of the members here, they aren’t banned?
[/quote]

That’s because he only has 12 posts. Can you imagine 1000 posts of him correcting people?[/quote]
Yes. Yes I can

Read full topic

item.title: Grammar Nazi!
item.dc:creator: @VB7_Rocks VB7 Rocks
item.description:
@VB7_Rocks wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:20, topic:196000”][quote author=VB7 Rocks link=topic=260556.msg2161000#msg2161000 date=1207377963]
Not to burst your bubble or anything, but only one space follows punctuation.
[/quote]

Two spaces follow a period that ends a sentence.

Look at the following sentences and tell if if you see a difference.

His name is prefaced with a Mr. Smith, who refuses to acknowledge it, continues the tradition.

His name is prefaced with a Mr. Smith, who refuses to acknowledge it, continues the tradition.

If you put a single space after abbreviation periods, and a single space after a sentence-ending period, how can you tell the difference?[/quote]

Because the sentence wouldn’t make sense otherwise.

Read full topic

item.title: Grammar Nazi!
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:17, topic:196000”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=260556.msg2160913#msg2160913 date=1207374850]
Tell me, [One space]What is wrong with correcting people’s spelling?

Would you like this in every topic?
[/quote]

Actually, “Tell me.” is a full sentence, so you are making unnecessary changes that alter the meaning of what I am saying. Also, two spaces follow a period.

That is spam and off-topic.

Is something barely legible or is something off topic worse?[/quote]

How many posts did he correct, that you could not read.

Read full topic

item.title: Grammar Nazi!
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

VB7 Rocks:

Not to burst your bubble or anything, but only one space follows punctuation.

Two spaces follow a period that ends a sentence.

Look at the following sentences and tell if if you see a difference.

His name is prefaced with a Mr. Smith, who refuses to acknowledge it, continues the tradition.
His name is prefaced with a Mr. Smith, who refuses to acknowledge it, continues the tradition.

If you put a single space after abbreviation periods, and a single space after a sentence-ending period, how can you tell the difference?

Read full topic

[/quote]

Not to burst your bubble or anything, but only one space follows punctuation.[/quote]
